```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

load("hasil_interview.rda")

# function tabulasi
tabulasi = function(var){
  df %>% 
  group_by(.data[[var]]) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(persen = n / sum(n) * 100,
         persen = round(persen,1),
         label = paste0(persen,"%"))
}

```
